home.subtitle: Real-time voice translation, powered by AI
home.tagline: Dual-lane transcription and instant translation across 15+ languages. Understand every conversation, live.
home.features.title: Why DuoVox?
home.feat.dual.title: Dual-Lane Transcription
home.feat.dual.desc: Two simultaneous AI streams capture both languages in a conversation independently, eliminating cross-talk errors and delivering accurate real-time text.
home.feat.langs.title: 15+ Languages
home.feat.langs.desc: From English and Russian to Japanese, Arabic, Hindi and more. The full interface is localised in every supported language, not just the transcription.
home.feat.ai.title: Instant AI Translation
home.feat.ai.desc: Translations appear within seconds of speech. Context-aware AI understands idioms, technical terms and natural conversation flow.
home.feat.offline.title: Offline Draft Mode
home.feat.offline.desc: No internet? On-device speech recognition provides draft transcription locally, so you never lose a word even without connectivity.
home.feat.platforms.title: Android & Windows
home.feat.platforms.desc: Use DuoVox on your phone for face-to-face conversations, or on your desktop for meetings, calls and media. Same experience, any device.
home.feat.privacy.title: Privacy-First Design
home.feat.privacy.desc: Zero data retention. Audio is processed in real-time and never stored. Transcriptions exist only in device memory and are cleared when your session ends. No recordings, no logs, no data on our servers.
home.pricing.title: Simple Pricing
home.pricing.subtitle:
Choose the plan that fits your needs. All paid plans include annual billing discounts.
Prices shown in USD. In-app pricing is displayed in your local currency via Google Play.
home.pricing.free.name: Free
home.pricing.free.f3: Unlock offline translation free — just watch a short video
home.pricing.essential.name: Essential
home.pricing.premium.name: Premium
home.pricing.business.name: Business
home.disclaimer.title: Accuracy Disclaimer
home.disclaimer.text: DuoVox uses AI-powered speech recognition and machine translation to assist communication. Like all transcription and translation tools, results may contain errors and should not be treated as a verbatim or certified record. Accuracy can be affected by background noise, accents, microphone quality, overlapping speech and domain-specific terminology. DuoVox is a communication aid and should not be relied upon for legal, medical, safety-critical, financial or official purposes. Always verify important information independently.
biz.title: DuoVox for Business
biz.subtitle: Professional-grade transcription and translation built for speed, accuracy, and privacy
biz.tagline: Unlimited usage, priority support, and zero-retention Private Mode. Built for professionals who depend on accuracy and confidentiality.
biz.price.label: per month — or $2,500/yr (save $500)
biz.privacy.title: Private Mode for Sensitive Work
biz.privacy.intro: Some conversations require absolute discretion. DuoVox includes a dedicated Private Mode designed for interpreters, healthcare professionals, legal teams, and anyone handling confidential information.
biz.privacy.f1.title: Real-Time Processing
biz.privacy.f1.desc: Audio is processed as it arrives and immediately discarded. Nothing is buffered or queued on our servers.
biz.privacy.f2.title: No Storage
biz.privacy.f2.desc: No recordings, transcripts, or metadata are stored on DuoVox servers. Session data exists only in device memory.
biz.privacy.f3.title: No Analytics
biz.privacy.f3.desc: No data is used for analytics, profiling, or model training. Your conversations remain entirely private.
biz.privacy.f4.title: Full Control
biz.privacy.f4.desc: Enable Private Mode at any time. When your session ends, the data is gone. Nothing to delete because nothing was saved.
biz.usecases.title: Professional Use Cases
biz.legal.title: Legal & Law Enforcement
biz.legal.desc: Real-time transcription for multilingual client interviews, depositions, witness interviews and court proceedings. Capture every word in both languages simultaneously for accurate records.
biz.medical.title: Medical & Healthcare
biz.medical.desc: Bridge language barriers in patient consultations, hospital admissions and medical appointments. Help practitioners communicate with patients who speak different languages, reducing misunderstanding.
biz.media.title: Media & Broadcasting
biz.media.desc: Live subtitling for interviews, press conferences and broadcasts. Journalists and production teams get instant bilingual transcripts of multilingual conversations and events.
biz.education.title: Education & Training
biz.education.desc: Support multilingual classrooms, lectures and training sessions. Students and trainees can follow along in their native language while the original speech is preserved in parallel.
biz.corporate.title: Business & Corporate
biz.corporate.desc: International meetings, client calls and negotiations with real-time transcription in both languages. Keep accurate records and ensure nothing is lost in translation across time zones.
biz.gov.title: Government & Diplomacy
biz.gov.desc: Multilingual briefings, consular services and diplomatic meetings. Dual-lane transcription provides transparent, parallel records for official proceedings.
biz.social.title: Social Services & Immigration
biz.social.desc: Caseworker interviews, asylum proceedings and community outreach. Help service providers communicate effectively with clients across language barriers.
biz.travel.title: Travel & Hospitality
biz.travel.desc: Hotels, tour operators and travel agencies serving international guests. Real-time translation for check-in, concierge services and face-to-face guest communication.
biz.included.title: What’s Included
biz.inc.quality.title: High Quality AI
biz.inc.quality.desc: Our most accurate transcription and translation models, powered by the latest AI technology for reduced word error rates.
biz.inc.unlimited.title: Unlimited Usage
biz.inc.unlimited.desc: No hourly caps to worry about. Use DuoVox as much as you need, every working day. Fair-use policy of 200 hours per month covers even the heaviest workloads.
biz.inc.langs.title: Up to 58 Languages
biz.inc.langs.desc: Real-time transcription and translation across a wide range of languages. From major world languages to less common ones, communicate across borders with ease.
biz.inc.subtitle.title: Subtitle Export
biz.inc.subtitle.desc: Export your transcriptions as industry-standard SRT or VTT subtitle files. Ready for video editing, archiving, or sharing with colleagues.
biz.inc.file.title: File & Document Translation
biz.inc.file.desc: Translate audio, video and document files directly within the app. Upload your content and receive a full transcription and translation without running a live session.
biz.inc.support.title: Priority Support
biz.inc.support.desc: Direct email support with faster response times. Business subscribers receive priority handling so you can resolve issues quickly.
biz.inc.duallane.title: Dual-Lane Technology
biz.inc.duallane.desc: Two parallel AI streams capture both sides of a conversation independently. No cross-talk, no confusion — each language gets its own dedicated transcription lane.
biz.inc.private.title: Private Mode
biz.inc.private.desc: Zero data retention for sensitive conversations. Audio is processed in real-time and never stored. Session data exists only in device memory and is automatically cleared when your session ends.
biz.compliance.title: Clear Compliance Position
biz.compliance.desc: DuoVox is designed with strong privacy protections, but it does not claim certification under any regulatory framework and does not sign Business Associate Agreements (BAAs). Organizations remain responsible for determining whether their use of DuoVox aligns with their internal compliance requirements. This transparency ensures customers understand exactly how DuoVox handles data while benefiting from a tool engineered for high-sensitivity use cases.
biz.disclaimer.title: Professional Use Disclaimer
biz.disclaimer.text: DuoVox is a communication aid powered by AI. While the Business plan uses our highest-accuracy models, transcription and translation output may still contain errors. DuoVox should not be used as a substitute for certified human interpreters or translators in legal, medical, or other contexts where accuracy is critical. Always verify important information independently and comply with applicable regulations regarding recording and transcription.
sec.title: Security & Privacy at DuoVox
sec.intro: Your conversations deserve the highest level of protection. DuoVox is built with a privacy-first architecture that gives users control over their data.
sec.private.title: Zero-Retention Private Mode
sec.private.f1: Audio is processed in real time and immediately discarded
sec.private.f2: No recordings or transcripts are stored on any server
sec.private.f3: No data is logged or retained by DuoVox
sec.private.f4: No information is used for analytics or model training
sec.private.ideal: This mode is ideal for interpreters, healthcare professionals, legal teams, and anyone handling sensitive information.
sec.standard.title: Standard Mode (Cloud Processing)
sec.standard.intro: When Private Mode is not enabled:
sec.standard.f1: Audio is streamed to third-party AI services for real-time transcription and is not stored by DuoVox
sec.standard.f2: Transcriptions and translations exist only in your device’s memory during the session
sec.standard.f3: No data is sold or shared with advertisers
sec.standard.f4: Third-party AI providers process data under their own privacy policies and do not use API data for model training under current policies
sec.principles.title: Data Handling Principles
sec.principles.f1: Minimal data collection — we collect only what is needed to provide the service
sec.principles.f2: No unnecessary retention — data is discarded as soon as it is no longer needed
sec.principles.f3: No sale of user data — your information is never sold to third parties
sec.principles.f4: No advertising-based profiling — we do not build profiles of our users
sec.principles.f5: Clear, transparent communication — we tell you exactly what happens with your data
sec.compliance.title: Compliance Transparency
sec.compliance.intro: DuoVox is designed with strong privacy protections, but:
sec.compliance.f1: DuoVox does not claim certification under any regulatory framework (including HIPAA, FERPA, or CCPA)
sec.compliance.f2: DuoVox does not sign Business Associate Agreements (BAAs)
sec.compliance.f3: Organizations are responsible for determining whether DuoVox fits their compliance needs
sec.compliance.why: This ensures clarity and avoids misleading claims.
sec.practices.title: Security Practices
sec.practices.f1: Encrypted data transmission (HTTPS/TLS) for all communications
sec.practices.f3: No DuoVox servers store user audio, transcriptions, or personal data
sec.control.title: Your Control
sec.control.f1: Enable Private Mode at any time for zero-retention sessions
sec.control.f2: Clear all session data instantly with the Clear button
sec.control.f3: Use DuoVox offline where supported — no data leaves your device
sec.control.f4: Uninstall the app to remove all locally stored data
faq.title: Privacy FAQ
faq.q1: Does DuoVox store audio or transcripts?
faq.a1: In Private Mode, DuoVox does not store audio, transcripts, or metadata. Everything is processed in real time and discarded immediately. In Standard Mode, audio is streamed to third-party AI services for processing and is not stored by DuoVox. Transcriptions exist only in your device’s memory during the session.
faq.a2: DuoVox does not claim HIPAA certification and does not sign Business Associate Agreements (BAAs). Organizations must determine whether using DuoVox fits their own compliance requirements.
faq.q3: Can DuoVox be used in healthcare settings?
faq.a3: Many healthcare professionals use DuoVox in Private Mode because it does not store any audio or transcripts. However, each organization must evaluate its own compliance obligations before adopting any tool.
faq.q4: Does DuoVox send data to third-party services?
faq.a4: In Private Mode, audio is processed through third-party AI services for real-time transcription but is not stored or retained by DuoVox or (under current provider policies) by the AI provider. In Standard Mode, the same applies. In Offline Mode, no data leaves your device at all.
faq.q5: Does DuoVox use my data to train AI models?
faq.a5: No. DuoVox does not use any of your data for training. Under current provider policies, data submitted via API is not used to train third-party AI models either.
faq.q6: Can DuoVox help my organization meet privacy requirements?
faq.a6: DuoVox provides privacy-preserving tools such as zero-retention Private Mode and offline processing. However, compliance decisions remain with the organization.
priv.title: Privacy Policy
priv.intro: David Arthur Software (“DAS”, “we”, “our”, “us”) operates the DuoVox application (the “App”). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use and protect your information when you use our App.
priv.s1.title: 1. Information We Collect
priv.s1.audio: Audio Data: The App captures audio from your device’s microphone or internal audio (speaker output) for real-time transcription. Audio is streamed directly to the transcription service and is not stored on our servers or on your device beyond the active session.
priv.s1.text: Transcription and Translation Text: Transcribed and translated text is displayed in the App during your session. This data is held in device memory only and is cleared when you clear the session or close the App. Text is not transmitted to DAS servers.
priv.s1.prefs: Preferences and Settings: Your app settings (selected language, theme, audio source, subscription tier) are stored locally on your device. They are not transmitted to any server.
priv.s1.diag: Diagnostic Logs: If you enable diagnostics, log files are stored locally on your device. You may choose to share these with us for support purposes, but they are never collected automatically.
priv.s2.title: 2. Third-Party Services
priv.s2.intro: The App integrates with the following third-party services:
priv.s2.ai: AI Service Providers: Audio data is streamed to third-party AI services for transcription, and text may be sent to AI services for translation. These providers process data under their own privacy policies and terms. Data submitted via API is not used to train AI models under current provider policies.
priv.s2.admob: Google AdMob: For users on the Free tier, we display rewarded video advertisements provided by Google AdMob. Google may collect device identifiers and usage data for ad personalization. You can manage ad personalization in your device’s Google settings. Google’s privacy policy is available at policies.google.com/privacy.
priv.s2.billing: Google Play Billing: Subscription purchases are processed through Google Play. Payment information is handled entirely by Google and is never accessed by DAS.
priv.s2.ondevice: On-Device Processing: The offline transcription feature runs entirely on your device using locally installed speech recognition models. No audio or text data leaves your device when using this feature.
priv.s3.title: 3. Data We Do NOT Collect
priv.s3.f1: We do not collect, store or transmit your audio recordings
priv.s3.f2: We do not collect personal information such as your name, email or phone number (unless you contact us for support)
priv.s3.f3: We do not track your location
priv.s3.f4: We do not sell any data to third parties
priv.s3.f5: We do not use analytics or tracking SDKs beyond what Google AdMob requires
priv.s4.title: 4. Data Storage and Security
priv.s4.p1: All user data (settings, preferences, diagnostic logs) is stored locally on your device. We do not operate servers that store user data.
priv.s5.title: 5. Children’s Privacy
priv.s5.p1: The App is not directed at children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.
priv.s6.title: 6. Your Rights
priv.s6.intro: Since all data is stored locally on your device, you have full control over it. You can:
priv.s6.f1: Clear all session data at any time using the Clear button
priv.s6.f3: Delete diagnostic logs from your device storage
priv.s6.f4: Uninstall the App to remove all locally stored data
priv.s7.title: 7. Changes to This Policy
priv.s7.p1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be reflected by updating the “Last updated” date at the top of this page. Continued use of the App after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
priv.s8.title: 8. Contact Us
priv.s8.p1: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or your data, please contact us at:
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These Terms of Service (“Terms”) govern your use of the DuoVox application (“App”) provided by David Arthur Software (“DAS”, “we”, “our”, “us”). By installing or using the App, you agree to these Terms.
terms.s1.title: 1. Description of Service
terms.s1.p1: DuoVox is a real-time voice transcription and translation application. The App captures audio, transcribes speech to text, and provides AI-powered translations between supported languages. The App is available on Android and Windows platforms.
terms.s2.title: 2. Subscription Tiers
terms.s2.intro: The App offers the following tiers:
terms.s2.free: Free: On-device transcription using local speech recognition. Offline translation can be unlocked temporarily by watching a short video.
terms.s2.essential: Essential ($25/month): AI transcription and translation using our Economy AI engine. Includes 30 hours of AI usage per month. Additional usage beyond the included hours is available on a pay-as-you-go basis.
terms.s2.premium: Premium ($65/month): High Quality AI transcription and translation for improved accuracy. Includes 40 hours of AI usage per month. Includes subtitle export (SRT and VTT formats) and file translation. Additional usage beyond the included hours is available on a pay-as-you-go basis.
terms.s2.business: Business ($250/month): All Premium features with unlimited usage (subject to a fair-use policy of 200 hours per month). Priority support. Designed for professional, legal, medical and media environments.
terms.s2.billing: All paid tiers are available with annual billing at a discounted rate (equivalent to two months free). Prices shown are approximate in USD; actual pricing is displayed in your local currency within the App and on the Google Play Store. Subscriptions are billed through Google Play and are subject to Google Play’s terms and refund policies.
terms.s2a.title: 2a. Usage Limits and Overage
terms.s2a.p1: Essential and Premium tiers include a set number of AI usage hours per billing cycle. Usage is measured as wall-clock time while AI transcription sessions are active. When you approach your limit, the App will notify you at 80% and 100% of your included hours. Beyond the included hours, you may continue using AI features at the per-minute overage rate for your tier. Unused hours do not carry over to the next billing cycle.
terms.s3.title: 3. Internet and Cloud Services
terms.s3.p1: Paid tier features require an active internet connection and access to cloud-based AI services. AI transcription and translation are provided through third-party service providers. Service availability depends on both DuoVox infrastructure and third-party provider uptime.
terms.s4.title: 4. Acceptable Use
terms.s4.intro: You agree to use the App only for lawful purposes. You must not:
terms.s4.f1: Use the App to record conversations without the consent of all parties, where required by applicable law
terms.s4.f2: Use the App in any way that violates applicable local, national, or international law
terms.s4.f3: Attempt to reverse-engineer, decompile, or extract the source code of the App
terms.s4.f4: Redistribute, sublicense, or resell the App or any part of it
terms.s4.f5: Use the App to generate content that is harmful, abusive, or violates the rights of others
terms.s5.title: 5. Accuracy and Limitations
terms.s5.p1: Transcription and translation are provided by AI services and are not guaranteed to be accurate. The App is intended as a communication aid and should not be relied upon for legal, medical, safety-critical or official translation purposes. DAS makes no warranty as to the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any transcription or translation output.
terms.s6.title: 6. Intellectual Property
terms.s6.p1: The App, including its code, design, icons, and documentation, is the intellectual property of David Arthur Software. You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the App for personal or business purposes in accordance with these Terms.
terms.s7.title: 7. Third-Party Services
terms.s7.p1: The App relies on third-party services for AI processing and advertising. These services have their own terms and privacy policies. DAS is not responsible for the availability, accuracy, or conduct of third-party services. Service interruptions by third-party providers may affect App functionality.
terms.s8.title: 8. Disclaimer of Warranties
terms.s8.p1: The App is provided “as is” and “as available” without warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including but not limited to implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement. DAS does not warrant that the App will be uninterrupted, error-free, or free of harmful components.
terms.s9.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
terms.s9.intro: To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, DAS shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from:
terms.s9.f1: Your use of or inability to use the App
terms.s9.f2: Any inaccuracy in transcription or translation output
terms.s9.f3: Unauthorized access to or alteration of your data
terms.s9.f4: Any third-party service interruption or failure
terms.s10.title: 10. Termination
terms.s10.p1: You may stop using the App at any time by uninstalling it. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate access to the App if you violate these Terms. Upon termination, all locally stored data remains on your device until you delete it.
terms.s11.title: 11. Changes to These Terms
terms.s11.p1: We may update these Terms from time to time. Changes will be reflected by updating the “Last updated” date at the top of this page. Your continued use of the App after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.
terms.s12.title: 12. Governing Law
terms.s12.p1: These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of England and Wales. Any disputes arising under these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of England and Wales.
terms.s13.title: 13. Contact Us
terms.s13.p1: If you have questions about these Terms, please contact us at:
